::Prowl::

Prowl sees the terror in Firedrill's eyes, pointing to the two CR 
chambers that the others were in.

"They're in there," he says. "I'm not sure how much damage they've 
taken, and their repair time will depend on that."

For some reason, this bot felt familiar to Prowl, though Prowl knew 
he had never seen him before in his life. He shakes the feeling, 
waiting for Firedrill to say something.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: This is Jeremiah, I am spending the night at rAuq's place, so 
> I will post from here if that's okay. As for the harsh words, lets 
just 
> say that everyone was wrong, especially me, so lets all just shake 
> hands, forgive and forget.
> 
> BIC:
> Firedrill opens his eyes, then looks at his newly reformed arm, and 
> flexes it. He felt good, but then looked around, and had terror in 
his 
> eyes. "Where are my friends?" He asks frantically.
